#summary System Requirements
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support

= Required =

  * .NET Framework 3.5
  * Windows XP SP2 or Vista
  * 10 MB Of RAM
  * 5.5 MB Of Free Disk Space
  * Krypton Toolkit 2.7.1 or higher
  * A PDF viewer

= Recommended =

  * .NET Framework 3.5
  * Windows XP SP2/Vista
  * 15 MB Of RAM
  * 6 MB Of Free Disk Space
  * Microsoft Visual C# 2008 Express Edition
  * Krypton Toolkit 2.7.1 or higher
  * Adobe Reader 8.0+
